events.message: nsis: Write to correct filename in first place

events.body: unsigned ACK 3b3b93174a216961f935b63b03732fbc2821ff92, makes sense to name it that way because it will raise the "unsinged" error in Windows
ACK if it passes travis/gitian build.

<!--a722867cd34abeea1fadc8d60700f111-->

issue.title: Bitcoin PR tracking
issue.body: The main purpose of this issue is to keep track of Pull Requests on Bitcoin since version 0.19.1 identifying those which make a porting LitecoinZ.

issue.title: [Build][Cleanup] Tidy up the gitian build descriptors
issue.body:
This is a collection of upstream PRs focused on cleaning up the gitian descriptors (un-needed or duplicate code bits, standardizing similar actions across the descriptors, etc), and minor cleanups to supporting build system files.

Included are the following upstream PRs:
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16141
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16184
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16667
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17097
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17029
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17308
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17756
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18059
